title-part.text: WEIGHING

note.note-paragraph: Attention is drawn to the Notes following the title of class G01.
In this subclass non-limiting references (in the sense of paragraph 39 of the Guide to the IPC) may still be displayed in the scheme.

title-part.text: Weighing apparatus involving the use of a counterweight or other counterbalancing mass
Pendulum-weight apparatus
